LanguageData.VME_CraftingQuality_Increased.label: increased
LanguageData.VME_CraftingQuality_Increased.descriptio:
We pride ourselves in our work, and take no shortcuts in achieving perfection.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color>
 - Increases quality of items created on a worktable by 1, up to Legendary.
LanguageData.VME_CraftingQuality_Decreased.label: decreased
LanguageData.VME_CraftingQuality_Decreased.descriptio:
We don't care about artisanal work. Why create something when you can buy it or steal it from others?

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color>
 - Decreases quality of items created on a worktable by 1, down to Awful.
